content: Stocks Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 03 Apr 2019Is Chinese PMI surprise- good news for all(including Singapore)?1 answerAnswerBump0

Leonard TanLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 04 Apr 2019Definitely, The Chinese Economy Superpower drives huge demand for many of Singapore's advanced manufacturing- chemical products, high end semiconductor waffers. As a trade dependent country, the implications of a weakening China will always indirectly affect Singapore's overall sector growth. Therefore any positive news and sentiment for China would definitely help outlook for SGX stocks.0 comments0
